setting.name: *mode
setting.desc: Map cycler mode. 'vote' mode will launch a vote at the end of the round. 'list' mode will use the list defined in mapcycle.xml. 'random' mode will choose a map at random.

setting.name: *vote_rounds
setting.desc: Number of rounds between map votes. Only effective if cycler mode is set to 'vote'.

setting.name: *random_rounds
setting.desc: Number of rounds between random map selections. Only effective if cycler mode is set to 'random'.

setting.name: *hibernate_when_empty
setting.desc: If true, the server will wait until a player joins to cycle maps. Only effective if cycler mode is set to 'list' or 'random'.
